name: qualifiable
content:
qualifiable adjective
(LIMITING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
able to be qualified (= limited in strength or meaning): These arguments have been revealed as eminently qualifiable, if not downright false. Objectives must be qualifiable and achievable.

qualifiable adjective
(COUNTING AS)
qualifying as something (= having all the necessary features of it): The pieces in his new book are not really qualifiable as short stories. It is questionable whether this sort of jazz is really qualifiable as popular music.
More examplesFewer examplesI have not seen any reasonable, qualifiable objections to this research.
